contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=November 2009}} '''Westmob''', a [[gang]] in [[San Francisco, California]], has fought a brutal gang war since 1999 against [[Big Block (gang)|Big Block]] and its various factions. Westmob is sometimes known to associate with Kumi 415 prison gang. and [[NorteÃ±os]] members. Its rivalry with Big Block was the subject of the 2002 [[Documentary film|documentary]] ''[[Straight Outta Hunter's Point]]''<ref>http://www.streetgangs.com/movies/hunterspoint.html</ref> and is linked to [[Hip hop music|rap]] and drugs. They claim territory from West Point to middle Point in San Francisco's notoriously dangerous [[Hunters Point, San Francisco, California|Hunters Point]] Projects.<ref>http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?file=/c/a/2001/12/16/MN232399.DTL</ref> The gang made headlines around the nation when one of its members was arrested for murdering a police officer in April 2004.<ref>http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/c/a/2006/11/21/BAGHLMGSDN1.DTL</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} [http://www.kron.com/Global/story.asp?S=1899361 KRON 4 news- ''Many SF Homicides Linked to Gang Wars''- Map of SF gang areas] [[Category:Modern street gangs]] [[Category:Gangs in San Francisco, California]] {{Crime-org-stub}}
